title: Wine flies when you're having fun.
Home is where the wine is.
Love the wine you're with.
meal without wine is called breakfast
You look like I need wine
I only drink wine on days that end with a "y".
What do friends and wine have in common? The older, the better.
Keep calm and pour on.
Wine is the answer, but I can't remember the question.
In dog wine, I've only had two glasses.
Today's forecast: sunny with a chance of wine.
As long as we have wine, family holidays will be fine.
Age and glasses of wine should never be counted.
Smile, there's wine.
Wine a little and you'll feel better.
line: Wine is bottled poetry. Robert Louis Stevenson
My only regret in life is that I did not drink more wine. Ernest Hemingway
Pour yourself a drink, put on some lipstick, and pull yourself together. Elizabeth Taylor
Age is just a number. It's irrelevant unless, of course, you happen to be a bottle of wine. Joan Collins
I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food. W.C. Fields
What wine goes with Captain Crunch? George Carlin
I drink and I know things. Tyrion Lannister, Game of Thrones
There comes a time in every woman’s life when the only thing that helps is a glass of champagne. Bette Davis
I drink to make other people more interesting. Ernest Hemingway
Taverns are universal places, like churches, hallowed meeting places of all mankind. Iris Murdoch
Fair thoughts and happy hours attend on you. William Shakespeare
To good eating belongs good drinking. German Proverb
The problem with the world is that everyone is a few drinks behind. Humphrey Bogart
I love everything that’s old: old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wine. Oliver Goldsmith
If food is the body of good living, wine is its soul. Clifton Fadiman
Making good wine is a skill; making fine wine is an art. Robert Mondavi
